title: Don't know why[BUG]
body:
**Describe the bug**
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4140747/113257653-7f984980-92fd-11eb-8f86-52eb811d0c06.png)
slave followed by slave?
deploy by redis-cluster-operator in k8s
**To reproduce**
can not
**Expected behavior**
expect master-slave are paired
**Additional information**
redission client throw a exception:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4140747/113257451-37792700-92fd-11eb-98fd-95ae6809a8bf.png)

comments_data.body: @wufengke What version of Redis did you use?
